headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; Sudden Death of Lorenzo B. Shepard. Funeral of Alderman Moser. The Valley Bank. Very Mysterious--A Man Murdered. The Democratic Dilliculty in the Third District. The Tabernacle Meeting in aid of Kansas. A Singular Affair.

NEW-YORK CITY.; Political. Mayor Wood as a Leetarer. Fort Hamilton Relief Society's Report. Naval. Narrow Escape. Commissioners of Health. Appointing Power of the Heads of Departments. The New-York University. Boy Drowned.

docs.lead_paragraph: DEMOCRATIC ASSEMBLY NOMINEES. An error occurred in our report of the action of the Democratic Assembly Conventions, on Thursday evening. WALTER JOYCE was not a candidate for nomination in the First Assembly District, and did not therefore receive the nomination. We annex a corrected and complete list of the gentlemen put in nomination in the various Distrits comprised within the limits of the City:

headline.main: TWO DAYS; IMPROVED HARVEST WEATHER. Stoppage of the Royal British Bank HEAVY SALES OF COTTON AT AN ADVANCE. Consols 94 7-8@95. Considerable Decline in Breadstuffs. SPEECH OF MR. DALLAS IN SHEFFIELD SEVENTY-SEVEN LIVES LOST. ARRIVAL OF THE ASIA. Sinking of the American Ship Ocean Home. INSURRECTION IN SWITZERLAND.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Mail steamer Asia, Capt. LOTT, from Liverpool, about 1 P.M., Saturday, 6th inst., arrived at this port early this morning. The U. S. M. steamship Arago arrived at a Southampton 7 A.M., of Thursday, 4th inst. The American ships Ocean Home and Cherubim came in collision off Lizzard on 5th inst. The Ocean Home sank in twenty minutes after the occurrence. Seventy-seven lives were lost by the disaster.

headline.main: Letter from Senator Seward--His Health; From the Detroit Tribune.

docs.lead_paragraph: My DEAR SIR: I have received your letter of the 8th instant, in which you ask me to address a Republican meeting at Detroit on the 2d of October at Jackson about the same time. I left Washington with health apparently so much impaired as to require not only that I should rest, but also seek the renovation of a voyage by sea.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Burlington (Vt.) Free Press gives the details of an amusing meeting of the "Old Whigs" of that place. The call, it seems, for the meeting, was signed "Whigs of Burlington." Rev. Dr. WHEELER was elected Chairman, after which lion. GEORGE P. MARSH rose to inquire by what authority the meeting had been called.

docs.lead_paragraph: GEO. PEABODY, the great American Banker, resident in London. was among the passengers who arrived by the Atlantic steamship yesterday from Liverpool. lie returns to his native country after an absence of about twenty years. During his absence he has not only attained an eminent position in financial circles, but has endeared himself to his countrymen, who have visited London, by his kindness and attention to them.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; COURT CALENDAR--TUESDAY. POLICE INTELLIGENCE. Fatal Runaway Accident--Two Lives Lost. A new Excitement--Did the Augusta smuggle in a Case of Yellow Fever.

docs.lead_paragraph: At the meeting of the Board of Health yesterday the Health Officer called attention to the resolutions passed by the Board several days since, relative to the inspector of vessels.
